name: Sacred Statue
languages: the languages the eidolon knew in life

traits.name: False Appearance
entries: While the statue remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal statue.

traits.name: Ghostly Inhabitant
entries: The {@creature eidolon|MTF} that enters the sacred statue remains inside it until the statue drops to 0 hit points, the eidolon uses a bonus action to move out of the statue, or the eidolon is turned or forced out by an effect such as the {@spell dispel evil and good} spell. When the eidolon leaves the statue, it appears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the statue.

traits.name: Inert
entries: When not inhabited by an {@creature eidolon|MTF}, the statue is an object.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The statue makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 43 (6d12 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock
entries: Ranged atk +8 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. 37 (6d10 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage.
